markdownRemark.html:
“I will teach you the principle to develop and the principle not to develop. … Listen and pay close attention, I will speak. And what is the principle not to develop? Killing living creatures … wrong view. This is called the principle not to develop.

And what is the principle to develop? Not killing living creatures … right view. This is called the principle to develop.”

AN.10.196. Bahulīkātabbasutta (“Principles That Should Be Made Much Of”)
